QuestData.Title: Panther Hunting
QuestData.Description: If you want to be a part of the hunt with this crack group under Hemet Jr.'s leadership, you're going to need to prove yourself an able panther hunter. You should start out easy: just focus on the young panthers for now. As you improve and gain experience as a hunter, you will undoubtedly find increasingly dangerous quarry.$b$bStart by heading east. Return to me when you are a master panther hunter.
QuestData.CompletionText: A true panther hunter would be out in the fields, trying to stalk his prey. Show some commitment to your goal, $c, and get back out there.
QuestData.RewardText: You feel more experienced already. Perhaps it's time to move on to bigger prey.
